name: Animal Friends and the Smog Factory
name_original: Animal Friends and the Smog Factory
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2023 - An End is a new Beginning

This interactive story tells the funny tale of a group of animal friends who were summoned to stop the evil Smog Factory from polluting their home.

The story is a meme with a message at the end! Hope you enjoy

Developer - Edom Games

Writer - Khoder

Music Credit: 

Main Theme Music - HitCtrl

Final Scene Music by Matthew Pablo
www.matthewpablo.com
